# thetalake_record (Resource)

Theta Lake Record Resource. Manages the review state of a record.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_record" "example" {
  id           = "rec_12345"
  review_state = "reviewed"
  comment      = "Reviewed by compliance team"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Record ID
- `review_state` (String) Review state of the record (e.g., reviewed, unreviewed, compliant, non-compliant)

### Optional

- `comment` (String) Comment associated with the review state

### Read-Only

- `content_date` (String) Date of the record content
- `participants` (List of String) List of participants
